title: Beetroot risotto
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) cooked beetroot, cubed', '75g (3 oz) arborio or risotto rice', '1 vegetable stock cube', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 eggs', '125g (5 oz) halloumi cheese', '3 big cloves of garlic, chopped', 'Dash of olive oil', '375ml (13 fl oz) port or red wine', 'Plenty of water', 'Fresh chives', 'Salt and pepper']
